title: Limonov: The Ballad
overview: A revolutionary militant, a thug, an underground writer, a butler to a millionaire in Manhattan. But also a switchblade-waving poet, a lover of beautiful women, a warmonger, a political agitator, and a novelist who wrote of his greatness. Eduard Limonovâ€™s life story is a journey through Russia, America, and Europe during the second half of the 20th century.
